channel.title: CVE Feed for iqonicdesign -- Graphina – Elementor Charts and Graphs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iqonicdesign -- Graphina – Elementor Charts and Graphs

item.title: CVE-2024-4574|2024-06-04T17:56:10.823Z -- iqonicdesign -- graphina%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20charts%20and%20graphs
item.description: The Graphina – Elementor Charts and Graphs plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via multiple widgets in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
